snippet: The global introduction of Samsung’s new premium smartphone, the Galaxy S5, has been marred in its home market of South Korea and is facing mixed reviews. And now, profit and sales appear to be on the decline.
abstract: The global introduction of Samsung’s new premium smartphone, the Galaxy S5, has been marred in its home market of South Korea and is facing mixed reviews. And now, profit and sales appear to be on the decline.

headline.main: Daily Report: Samsung's Earnings to Decline as Smartphone Sales Slow
